body_content.explanation: having a good understanding of the way people behave and/or a good knowledge of culture and fashion:
examples: She was slim, svelte, and sophisticated.
I don't think I have any books that would suit your sophisticated tastes.
He was older than me and from London and I thought him very sophisticated.

body_content.explanation: intelligent or made in a complicated way and therefore able to do complicated tasks:
examples: I think a more sophisticated approach is needed to solve this problem.
These are among the most sophisticated weapons in the world.
